title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Effective Educational Audio Design and Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four core principles of educational audio design (narrative format selection, consideration of auditory temporality, environmental sound design, recognition of listening-hearing differences).
Learners can produce audio content for effective language learning in mobile environments.
Learners can analyze and improve the effectiveness of audio learning materials produced according to formative assessment criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
